definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: The soldiers thought that it would be a long time before civil government would be re-established.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們認爲要在很久以後才能重建平民政府。

sentences.english: Many of the acolytes have been in hiding amongst the populace.
sentences.chinese: 許多寺僧都隱藏在平民當中。

sentences.english: How many common people could afford such expensive fees?
sentences.chinese: 有多少平民百姓能夠支付得起這樣昂貴的“面聖”費？

sentences.english: Concubinage is still the privilege of the rich class, but there still exist the phenomenon that the civilian concubinage.
sentences.chinese: 納妾雖屬於富貴階層的特權，但平民納妾也不在少數。

sentences.english: For civilians, the impact would incalculable.
sentences.chinese: 對於平民，這項研究成果更是具有不可估量的作用。

sentences.english: He said the situation for civilians has become intolerable.
sentences.chinese: 他說，平民百姓的處境已經到了不能容忍的地步。

sentences.english: The idea of a "civilian" depends on an association between innocence and the non-combatant.
sentences.chinese: 平民的概念是取決於無辜和非參戰的結合。

sentences.english: Korean army civilian targets, how do we play?
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮軍隊怎麼能打我們平民目標呢？

sentences.english: Historically, the populist aim was prosperity and equality for all.
sentences.chinese: 在歷史上，平民主義者的目標是實現富裕和人人平等。

sentences.english: They live inside the wire, in the middle of nowhere, separated from the civilian population.
sentences.chinese: 他們生活在鐵絲網內，無處可藏，與平民百姓隔離。

sentences.english: Official statistics indicate 13 civilians were burned or stabbed to death.
sentences.chinese: 據官方統計，13名平民被燒死或刺死。

sentences.english: The commander ordered that all civilians (should) be evacuated.
sentences.chinese: 司令員命令撤退所有平民。

sentences.english: The abrogation of his privileges made him an ordinary people.
sentences.chinese: 特權的取消使他成爲了平民。

sentences.english: Of the university gain ground, it is the course that university civilian changes.
sentences.chinese: 大學的普及，就是大學平民化的過程。

sentences.english: In particular, indiscriminate attacks on civilians are a grave matter, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是，無差別的攻擊平民是一個嚴重的問題。

sentences.english: British England Royal Wedding, William and Kath.
sentences.chinese: 英國皇室婚禮，威廉王子和平民公主凱特。
